pr_title: Update font size immediately to reflect changed settings while filling a form

timeline.message: update font size immediately while filling a form

timeline.bodyText: It would be good to factor it out to a separate method, onResume() is big enough... our goal should be to have small methods with good names to read the code like a story. I know it might be difficult to find such an approach especially looking at ForEntryActivity class but that's a good practice.
timeline.author: grzesiek2010

replies.bodyText: The name could be adjustFontSize for example.
replies.author: grzesiek2010
